title: How and whither a Christen man ought to flye the horrible plage of the pestilence A sermon out of the Psalme. Qui habitat in adsutorio altissimi. By Andrewe Osiander. Translated out of hye Almayn in to Englishe.
author: Osiander, Andreas, 1498-1552.
publicationStmtPublisher: By me James Nicolson. for Jan Gough],
